p: The EOs of C. nubigenum and L. angustifolia were found to have a definitely toxic effect on the eggs of L. sericata. The ovicidal activity was dependent on the EOs ( F 1,45 = 38.354; P < 0.001) and on the dose ( F 1,45 = 74.261; P < 0.001). The most effective EO was the C. nubigenum one with an LC 50 value of 0.07 μL cm -2 while the LC 50 value of the EO of L. angustifolia was 0.48 μL cm -2 ( Table 3).
